name: Kayyyy
wishText: i can't be with you for your birthday again so I hope this partially makes up for it, I love you hun <3
textInChatBox: Happy birthday hunny! I love you!! blah blah blah...
text2: that's what I was going to do and be done.
text4: I realised that was probably pretty boring so I wanted to add more
text5Content: you are are most special person in the whole world to me
outroText: i hoped you liked it *insert puppy eye emoji*
replayText: oh if you wanna watch this whole thing again, just click the screen
